rows.label: qev095202_MSG0001
rows.name: Did you receive our distress call?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095202_MSG0002
rows.name:
We were only able to broadcast a very weak signal for
fear of the Ganglion. We are glad it was sufficient.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095202_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev095202_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask who the xenoforms are.

rows.label: qev095202_JNK0020
rows.name: Assist

rows.label: qev095202_SEL0021
rows.name: Offer the xenoforms help if they require it.

rows.label: qev095202_MSG0003
rows.name: You came this far without identifying us?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095202_MSG0004
rows.name:
You humans are truly a most unusual race.
It is curious that organisms so prone to irrational
behavior have survived this long.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095202_MSG0005
rows.name:
Still, your arrival proves that we were right to have sent
our signal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095202_MSG0006
rows.name:
While you seem less than logical, you clearly possess
considerable combat prowess.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095202_MSG0007
rows.name:
By our calculations, humans have a 51 percent chance
of destroying the Ganglion. We wish to ally ourselves
with the stronger side.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095202_MSG0008
rows.name: Reaching out to you for aid was a logical inevitability.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095202_MSG0009
rows.name:
However, we represent a valuable asset to the
Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095202_MSG0010
rows.name:
They will be loath to part with our considerable
technological expertise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095202_MSG0011
rows.name:
It follows that they will embark on a concerted attack
against your kind in order to take us back by force.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095202_MSG0026
rows.name: Indeed. Hence the distress signal we sent out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095202_JNK0030
rows.name: Suggest

rows.label: qev095202_SEL0031
rows.name: Urge them to come back to New LA with you.

rows.label: qev095202_JNK0040
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev095202_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask what their race is called.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095202_JNK0050
rows.name: Probe

rows.label: qev095202_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask why the xenoform referred to itself as "we."

rows.label: qev095202_MSG0012
rows.name: That is a logical course of action.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095202_MSG0013
rows.name: But I fear it is somewhat premature.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095202_MSG0014
rows.name:
There are others of my kind who are currently stranded.
I would ask that you help me rescue them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095202_MSG0015
rows.name:
There is no time for protracted introductions,
but we are called the Orphe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095202_MSG0016
rows.name:
The reason for my haste is that there are others of my
kind awaiting aid, and large-scale rescues require time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095202_MSG0017
rows.name: A rather perceptive inquiry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095202_MSG0018
rows.name:
As it happens, there are others of my kind awaiting
aid. I require your help in rescuing them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095202_MSG0019
rows.name: This constitutes all existing Orphe at present.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095202_MSG0020
rows.name: I request that you now escort us to New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095202_MSG0021
rows.name: Hmm... Regrettable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095202_MSG0022
rows.name: I suppose detection was inevitable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095202_MSG0023
rows.name: My kind are technologists, not warriors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095202_MSG0024
rows.name: You will have to fight them and keep us safe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095202_MSG0025
rows.name: Please?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095202_MSG1001
rows.name: Enemy neutralization confirmed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095202_MSG1002
rows.name:
You have done well. Now please accompany us to
New LA before reinforcements arrive.[ST:wait ]
